fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.management

Interface DHTManagementI.NodeContentI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing interface:
    DHTManagementI

    public static interface DHTManagementI.NodeContentI
extends java.io.Serializable
    The interface NodeContentI is meant to mark objects than represent the content of a node to be saved and stored in the remaining nodes after a merge.

    Description

    When trying to split or merge two nodes during a pass over the ring, the algorithm has to get the content of the suppressed node to put it in the remaining nodes after the merge. As this information is node and algorithm dependent, the user must define what is actually needed and then create a class which instances will store this content to be transmitted. These content store classes must implement the interface NodeContentI.

    Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2025-02-06

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
